noActiveShiftMessage.label: No active shift message
noActiveShiftMessage.helpText: This message will be spoken when the number is called but no schedule is currently active.

voiceResponses.defaultNoActiveShiftMessage: No active shift for this phone number.
voiceResponses.unknownPhoneNumber: The phone number you have dialed {{ phoneNumber }} is not set up. If you are the administrator, please add this phone number to the Rotator configuration.
